name: Publishers.Drop
desc: A publisher that omits a specified number of elements before republishing later elements.

items.name: init(upstream: Upstream, count: Int)
items.desc: Creates a publisher that omits a specified number of elements before republishing later elements.

items.name: typealias Output
items.desc: The kind of values published by this publisher.

items.name: typealias Failure
items.desc: The kind of errors this publisher might publish.

items.name: let upstream: Upstream
items.desc: The publisher from which this publisher receives elements.

items.name: let count: Int
items.desc: The number of elements to drop.

items.name: static func == (Publishers.Drop<Upstream>, Publishers.Drop<Upstream>) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two publishers are equivalent.
